Package exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FolderCreationException
    Will be triggered if the directory could not be created.
    FormatNotFoundException
    Will be triggered if the format given by the user isn't present in the properties.
    IsNotFileException
    Will be triggered if the path of the given file to process is not a file.
    IsNotJarException
    Will be triggered if the given path of the plugin during the installation isn't a jar file.
    PluginDependenciesNotPresentException
    Will be triggered if the plugin dependencies are not present.
    PluginIsInstalledException
    Will be triggered if the plugin is already installed.
    PluginIsNewer
    Will be triggered if installed plugin is newer or the same as the proposed one.
    PluginNotFoundException
    Will be triggered if the given plugin isn't installed.
    PluginSpecsNotFoundException
    Will be triggered if the plugin specifications aren't given.
